IconDefinition.name: IconDefinition
IconDefinition.description: Represents the icon-related metadata for a custom tab.

ContentType.description: The tab icon’s content type, for example, “image/png.”

DurableId.description: A unique virtual Salesforce ID for the icon.

Height.description: The tab icon’s height in pixels. If the icon content type is an SVG type, height and width values are not used.

Url.description: The fully qualified URL for this icon.

Width.description: The tab icon’s width in pixels. If the icon content type is an SVG type, height and width values are not used.
